title: Using my First Smartphone in 2017
description: The Palm Pixi Plus was my first smartphone but in 2017 it doesn't hold up so well. Is this the World's Smallest Smartphone?  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:  Facebook:
transcript: - Hey guys, this is Austin, and today I'm here with my very first smartphone. So back in 2011 when I was rocking some seriously sweet hair I picked up one of these guys for 50 bucks, and today it's time to give it another shot. So this is the Palm Pixi Plus. Now I was able to find one of these brand new in the box, and since I didn't have my original one anymore I couldn't resist. As you can see, smartphones have changed just a little bit since then.
